QuestData.Title: Paradise Lost
QuestData.Description: Archmage Khadgar was planning an expedition to Azsuna - you should seek him out at Krasus' Landing in Dalaran immediately.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Archmage Khadgar at Krasus' Landing in Dalaran.
QuestData.RewardText: Perfect. Up for a little trip down to Azsuna?
